name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, and skilled in **SQL** and **Angular** for both frontend and backend solutions. Expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms to drive predictive analytics and automation while ensuring real-time data processing. 
Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, and managing CI/CD pipelines, facilitating efficient software delivery. Recognized for compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong problem-solving capabilities, with a deep understanding of MLOps leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, coupled with a commitment to continuous learning and adapting to hybrid work environments.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable applications utilizing **Java** and **SQL** to enhance data-driven decision-making in healthcare and fintech sectors.
• Led the design and implementation of user-friendly interfaces with **Angular**, ensuring optimal user experiences in both mobile and web applications.
• Integrated **Machine Learning** algorithms for predictive analytics, enabling real-time decision-making for risk assessment and fraud mitigation.
• Employed problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and optimize existing systems, reducing processing time by **30%** through innovative solutions.
• Championed continuous learning initiatives within the team, facilitating workshops and knowledge-sharing sessions on emerging technologies and best practices in software development.
• Collaborated in a hybrid work environment, leveraging tools for effective communication and project management while ensuring team alignment and productivity.
• Contributed to the transformation of legacy systems into modular architectures, seamlessly transitioning to cloud environments.
• Managed database systems using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring data integrity and availability for application users.
• Delivered mobile applications for multiple platforms, enhancing user engagement through the latest frameworks.
• Built automated CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes, reducing release cycles by **40%**.
• Enhanced application performance through proactive monitoring and optimization, achieving a **99.9%** uptime in production.
• Facilitated cross-functional collaboration to meet project deadlines, ensuring alignment with business objectives and user needs.
• Championed high coding standards through rigorous testing strategies and code reviews, resulting in improved software quality and reduced bugs.

Developed solutions using **Java** and **SQL** to enhance existing financial applications, ensuring high performance and reliability across various environments.
Utilized **Angular** to design user-friendly interfaces, promoting an intuitive user experience for financial tools and applications.
Implemented **Machine Learning** algorithms for predictive analytics, contributing to improved decision-making processes in fraud detection and credit scoring.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in a **Hybrid Work** setting, leveraging effective communication and problem-solving skills to drive project success and meet deadlines.
Engaged in **Continuous Learning** to stay updated with the latest technologies and frameworks, applying this knowledge to optimize system architectures and processes.
Integrated microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), modernizing core systems to enhance scalability for high-volume transactions.
Created interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to build sleek, responsive interfaces.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with instant insights into over **10,000** transactions daily.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating smooth asynchronous communication across workflows, including payments and compliance.
Developed **ETL** pipelines for processing financial data utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, efficiently handling both batch and real-time data with over **5 TB** processed monthly.
Built machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive monitoring of suspicious activities based on analytical models.
Established **ML** pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference seamlessly into backend services.

Utilized **Java** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules.
Applied **SQL** for efficient data management and execution of complex queries, enhancing data retrieval processes for high-traffic workflows.
Developed responsive frontend applications using **Angular** (version 13), delivering fast user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Engaged in **Machine Learning** techniques to enhance personalization of product listings and improve conversion rates by analyzing real-time behavioral data.
Demonstrated advanced **Problem Solving** skills by implementing and troubleshooting backend and frontend features efficiently, ensuring system reliability and performance.
Promoted a **Hybrid Work** environment by participating in daily stand-ups and collaborative sessions to foster team synergy and project alignment.
Adopted a strategy of **Continuous Learning** by integrating new technologies and frameworks, ensuring the team remains at the forefront of industry advancements.
Designed and engineered real-time features utilizing **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating dynamic updates and customer interactions.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** for enhanced user engagement and product relevance.
Implemented **Redis** caching strategies, improving response times and reducing database load by over **30%** during peak operations.
Executed feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** for controlled rollouts and A/B testing, significantly mitigating deployment risks.
Built secure payment workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, guaranteeing compliance with **PCI** standards and safeguarding sensitive customer data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to ensure secure access control and adherence to **GDPR** compliance across user and admin interactions.
